law.catch_line: No other license to be issued for five years after revocation.
law.text: No person who has had a broker's or sales associate's license revoked shall be issued another license for five (5) years from the date of revocation. All persons seeking issuance of another license after the five (5) year period of revocation may do so only at the discretion of the commission and shall retake the appropriate examination and meet all of the contemporary licensing requirements.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 488, sec. 20, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 448, sec. 19, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 196, sec. 24, effective July 15, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3990e-6.
